|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module socket, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, Audio out (3.5 mm), PoE Expansion header, fan header, SPI, I2C, CAN, SPDIF, PWM, UART, GPIO, RTC |addchip = 1Mbit SPI Flash;Winbond;W25X10CLZPIG;;1;,,, 4Kbit I2C Serial EEPROM;Giantec;GT24C04A;;1;,,, I2C RTC;Haoyu Microelectronics;HYM8563TS;;1;,,, Super Speed USB 3.0 Host Controller;VIA;VL805;;1;,,, 300mA Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Diodes Inc;AP7331;;1;,,, PMIC for Multi-Core High Performance System;X-Powers;AXP15060;;1;,,, Precision Power Distribution Switch;TOLL Microelectronic;TMI6262AL;;2;,,, Precision Voltage Supervisor w/ Int Watchdog Timer;SGMicro;SGM820;;1;,,, 80mÎ© Current-Limited Power-Distribution Switch;AeroSemi;MT9700;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;Union Semi;UM3204;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchro Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8089A;;2;,,, 30V High Current Boost LED Driver;Silergy;SY7203;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "milkV" and "Mars V1.21" are silkscreened on board top.
{{See also|StarFive VisionFive|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[StarFive]] JH7110 -U74x4 @1.5GHz :SoC: Quad-Core RISC-V (RV64GC) 64-bit *GPU: Imagination BXE-4-32 @600MHz :(OpenGL ES3.2, OpenVG 1.2, Vulkan 1.2) :VPU: H.264/H.265 decoder up to 4Kp30, :H.265 encoder up to 1080p30 *Storage: 16MB (SPI) Flash (''[[GigaDevice]]''), :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot, :eMMC module socket *Memory: 8GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM (''[[Micron]]'') *Network: 1x GbE ports (w/ PoE support) *PCIe: NGFF M.2 (Key-E) socket w/ PCIe 2.0 *USB: 3x USB 3.0 ports, 1x USB 2.0 port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: 5V/3A via USB (Type-C) or :5V Power from the GPIO Pin 2 and 4 or :via PoE via PoE expansion header
==Links of Interest== *[https://milkv.io/docs/mars/overview Documentation] *[https://www.tomshardware.com/news/milk-v-unveils-risc-v-raspberry-pi-alternative-milk-v-mars ''Milk-V Unveils RISC-V Raspberry Pi Alternative: Milk-V Mars'' on '''tom's Hardware'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/milk-v-mars-single-board-computer-features-risc-v-starfive-processor/ ''Milk-V Mars single board computer features RISC-V StarFive processor'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.hackster.io/news/milk-v-surprises-with-a-second-risc-v-sbc-physically-compatible-with-the-raspberry-pi-3-model-b-fa548a5908e8 ''Milk-V Surprises with a Second RISC-V SBC'' on '''hackster.io''']
